name: BartonellosisTestsForBartonellaSppIgMAntibodyInAClinicalSpecimenByAnyMethod
title: Bartonellosis (Tests for Bartonella spp. IgM Antibody in a clinical specimen by any method)
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains codes for laboratory test names associated with detecting the presence of Bartonella spp. IgM),(Data Element Scope: Laboratory tests names that were ordered or observed),(Inclusion Criteria: Bartonella spp. IgM),(Exclusion Criteria: None)
